Name: Thalassian Tidecaller
Story Background: Born and raised in the depths of the ocean, the Thalassian Tidecaller  wields the power of the tides to aid their kin in times of need.
Ability: Whenever you cast a Merfolk spell, you may tap or untap target permanent.
Appearance Description: The Thalassian Tidecaller is a graceful figure, adorned with shells and coral. They are surrounded by an aura of swirling water, their eyes glowing with the deep blue of the ocean depths.
